## isTypedArray() function

Check whether an argument is an array where each member is of the specified type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function isTypedArray<T>(array: unknown, check: (x: any) => x is T): array is T[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  array | unknown | array to check |
|  check | (x: any) =&gt; x is T | a type guard to use when validating each item |

<b>Returns:</b>

array is T\[\]
